multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is a WBS - Work Breakdown Structure?

choicegroup.choice: Deliverable-Oriented hierarchical decomposition of the work to be 'executed' by the team to accomplish the project objectives and create the required deliverables
Damage-Oriented hierarchical decomposition of the task to be 'acted' by the team to accomplish the project objectives and destroy the required deliverables
Deliverable-Oriented hierarchical decomposition of the work to be 'reviewed' by the team to plan the project objectives and deliver the required deliverables
Deliverable-Oriented unstructure map of the work to be 'executed' by the team to accomplish the project objectives and review the required deliverables
